# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $8,000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that is worth more than what you're paying, making it a great investment. Don't miss out on this chance to secure a fantastic deal. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
